WorkItem.Description:
I am visual studio 2008 user, and i write MFC program. i used use mfc 4.2 old version, i know in visual studio 2008 , mfc souce code change a lot. and  CMFCToolBar* classes , i don't know how to use these classes.
 
CMFCToolBar
CMFCToolBarButton
CMFCToolBarEditBoxButton
CMFCToolBarFontComboBox
 
i search these classes name in All-In-One code framework, it said , 
 
" We do not find any relevant code samples for your qurey "CMFCToolBarColorButton MFC C++". 
You consider requesting the code sample from Microsoft  All - In - One Code Framework
 
i know in Visual Studio 2010 sample have these demoes application.  
 
Why visual Studio 2008 haven't these demoes application.
 
Does it means All-In-On code framework is sort of deceptious tools ?
WorkItem.Summary: All-In-One Code Framework can't help me find useful sample code.
